ygData.subject: Re: Skull topped staff
ygData.msgSnippet: This is not possible as of now. What you are referring to are the staves the priests of discord hold. One of which I ll post below to make you drool.... Staff
ygData.messageBody:
This is not possible as of now. What you are referring to are the staves the
priests of discord hold. One of which I'll post below to make you drool....

Staff of Writhing (or Writhering)
1 handed blunt
Dmg 9 Delay 33
Effect: Chaotic Feedback (48dmg when successful)
Weight: 8.0
Classes: Wiz, Enc, Mag, Nec, Brd (yes a bard for some stupid reason)
Races: all

It's a wicked little thing, and it looks just like the ones a priest of
discord is holding.

>From: greenidminx@...
>
>I've heard a vague rumor that it's possible to find a skull somewhere to
>attach to the top of the runed totem staff, thus making it a
>different/better weapon.
>
>Is this possible? If so, where do you get the skull, and how is it
>attached to the staff?
>
>Thank you!
>
>Ximena, Wizard, Fennin Ro
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>How many communities do you think join ONElist each day?
>http://www.onelist.com
>More than 1,000! Create yours now!
